title: 'An extreme last resort': Police reluctant to ticket, arrest COVID-19 rule-breakers
description: Threats of stiff fines and even criminal charges for COVID-19 scofflaws appear to be mostly tough talk, as authorities opt for persuasion over punishment
content: The government warnings to Canadians to keep their distance and stay home especially if they have recently been abroad are being delivered in the sternest terms The duration of this crisis will be determined by the choices we make right now So if you wan chars
